original: JOHANSSON, Percy Kasimir, Sadelmakare-mästare, Värnamo, f Klippan, Gråmanstorps församl, Kristianstads l, 4/10 86 av sadelmak.-mast L J o Vilhelmina Nilsson, gm (1) Lili Olsen (d), (2) Hill Enström f Nilsson. Kust-art^ uoff.sk i Kkrona 03—06, yrkessk i Ystad 08, mästarekurs SHO Sthlm 22, mästarebrev 29. Lärlingsutbildn h fadern i Ryssby, konditioner i Ystad 07—08 o i Malmö 08—09, inneh eg sadelmakeri i Ljungby 09—11, i Värnamo sed. 12 (m reseffektaffär sed. 14). Lär v rnästarekurser å Hantv.inst i Sthlm 30 o 44. Medl o rev i sadelmakaresekt av Sv Sadelm-o Tapetseraremästares Riksfrb o dess ekon frn SATA. Styr.ordf i Värnamo stads yrkessk. Medarb i Tidn f Sv Sadelm- o Tapet-seraremästare. Inneh Sv Hantv- o Småind.-org:s veteranmärke. Hobbies: Cykling, promenader i skog o mark.
translated: JOHANSSON, Percy Kasimir, Master Saddlemaker, Värnamo, born in Klippan, Gråmanstorps parish, Kristianstad county, on 10/4 1886, son of master saddlemaker L J and Vilhelmina Nilsson, married (1) Lili Olsen (deceased), (2) Hill Enström, formerly Nilsson. Served as a coastal artillery officer in Karlskrona from 1903 to 1906, attended vocational school in Ystad in 1908, completed a master's course at the Stockholm Crafts Organization in 1922, obtained a master's certificate in 1929. Apprenticed under his father in Ryssby, worked as a journeyman in Ystad from 1907 to 1908 and in Malmö from 1908 to 1909, owned a saddlemaking business in Ljungby from 1909 to 1911, and in Värnamo since 1912 (also operated a travel goods store since 1914). Taught at master's courses at the Crafts Institute in Stockholm in 1930 and 1944. Member and reviewer in the Saddlemaker's sector of the Swedish Saddlemaker and Upholsterer Master's Association and its economic department. Chairman of the Vocational School in Värnamo. Contributor to the Swedish Saddlemaker and Upholsterer Master's Journal. Holds the Veteran Badge from the Swedish Crafts and Small Industry Organization. Hobbies include cycling, walks in forests and nature.

structured.name: Percy Kasimir Johansson

memberOf.name: Swedish Saddlemaker and Upholsterer Master's Association
Swedish Crafts and Small Industry Organization
